Description: The name of the Attribute as it appears to site users. Attribute names can also be referenced in selection queries.
The numeric value that overrides the default alphanumeric order of Attributes. Attributes with blank fields will be sorted alphanumerically and displayed below Attributes with numbers.
The number of times this Attribute is used (read-only).
The description of the Attribute, for use by Designer admins only and will not appear to site users.
A semicolon delimited list of default Attribute values used to populate Designer pull-down menus. Additional attribute values will be appended to the list as they are defined.
